abstract: Stocks plummeted across the Asia-Pacific region on Monday and the euro plumbed fresh multiyear lows against the dollar and yen, amid disappointing American jobs data and renewed fears that the European sovereign debt crisis could spread to other vulnerable economies.
snippet: Stocks plummeted across the Asia-Pacific region on Monday and the euro plumbed fresh multiyear lows against the dollar and yen, amid disappointing American jobs data and renewed fears that the European sovereign debt crisis could spread to other v...
lead_paragraph: Stocks plummeted across the Asia-Pacific region on Monday and the euro plumbed fresh multiyear lows against the dollar and yen, amid disappointing jobs data in the United States and renewed fears that the European sovereign debt crisis could spread to other vulnerable economies, Bettina Wassener writes in The New York Times.

headline.main: Worries About Europe Rattle Asian Stocks

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
